item.title: Whither IIT?
item.description: Enjoying fame and keeping an independent mind is not something one can expect from anyone. Fame is a double-edge sword. one feel tempted to do whatever one’s admirers want, and admirers are possessed with the one being admired.Â It creates a loop with ‘positive feedback’; and ‘positive feedback’ is known do nasty thing to a system, especially to its stability. It is far from my intention to build a ‘system theory’ for these kind of social behavior.
